The Plague Dogs

Ano: 1982

IMDb ID: tt0084509

Classificação: 7.7

Sinopse: An animated adaptation of Richard Adams' novel, about a pair of dogs (Snitter and Rowf) who escape from a research laboratory and try to survive in the wild with the help of a cunning fox (The Tod). The lab director tries to keep the escape quiet, but as an increasing number of sheep are found killed, word leaks out, together with rumors that the dogs might be plague carriers.—Michael Brooke
